Description.Text: The Travel Inn. The perfect combination of convenience, comfort & value. Whether you are traveling to New York City for business or pleasure, the Travel Inn is perfectly suited to meet all your needs. Parking is absolutely free, indoor and secure, with no in or out charges. Strategically located, the Travel Inn is only three short blocks from the Jacob K. Javits Convention Center. Fine restaurants, theaters, Circle Line Cruises, the Port Authority and Manhattan's most popular attractions are within minutes walking time.

• Jacob Javits Convention Center – 3 blocks • Times Square – 3 blocks • Broadway Theaters – 10 blocks • Penn Station – 1 mile • Rockefeller Center – 1 mile • Museum of Modern Art – 1.5 miles • Central Park – 1.5 miles • Lincoln Center – 1.5 miles • Empire State Building – 2 miles • Guggenheim Museum – 4 miles

This New York hotel has 160 guestrooms in a seven-story building with interior/exterior corridors. Travel Inn features elegant guestrooms that are decorated with modern fixtures and furnishings and come with an array of in-room amenities. The hotel also offers specially adapted rooms to accommodate and meet the special needs of physically disabled guests. All rooms at the Travel Inn offer data ports, voice mail, irons and ironing boards, and room service.

Set on the far west side, just two and a half block from Jacob K. Javits Convention Centre and six blocks from Grand Central Station, Travel Inn Express New York is placed convenient to Lincoln Tunnel, Circle Line cruises and intrepid museum. This property is also placed just minutes from Broadway and all major shopping areas. The conference facility provided by the hotel is an ideal place to host your business meets and seminars. A well appointed gymnasium and a swimming pool are also available.
• All major credit cards are accepted. • Pets not allowed • Check-in time is 2 PM • Check-out time is Noon

From LaGuardia Airport: Drive northeast on La Guardia Road. Turn left toward Terminal A/Rental Car Returns. Turn left on Central Terminal Drive. Proceed to the Airport Exit ramp. Merge on Grand Central Parkway West toward Manhattan. Proceed to Brooklyn Queens Expressway Exit toward Staten Island. Merge on Brooklyn Queens Expressway East. Continue to I-495 Exit toward Midtown Tunnel. Merge on I-495 West via Exit 35 West on the left toward Midtown Tunnel. Stay right at the fork in the ramp. Turn left on East 37th Street. Turn right on 3rd Avenue. Turn left on East 42nd Street.
